review: I was blown away when I connected my Firestick and realized my full potential as an Amazon Prime Member. I don't need Netflix or Hulu with my Prime membership. Through the Firestick my entertainment media is fully content. I was so over whelmed that I bought another one and plan to order more to give as Christmas gifts. I can go from room to room, on trips and everything. It's an awesome product.
author: Butch Mose

review: Ordered the Fire Stick because it sounded great. I have already been using google chrome for awhile now and thought this would be similar with greater access to show's movies etc.What I found was a horrible interface with little to no organization. The only way to navigate through the screens is with this tiny flimsy remote. And even one there you must scroll to the organization you want (genre, new movies, prime, etc). Then once there, there' no organization to how the movies are set up, you can only scroll through all 150 plus titles one at a time.After using Google Chrome I don't see how anyone could enjoy using amazon firestick. It's cumbersome, requires a direct power outlet, and has mediocre offerings. Frankly I'd rather be able to switch applications at the touch of a finger and scroll freely without having to click 149 times to get to the right film.It now lives in my drawer, and I expect it will stay there for the foreseeable future.
